item.title: How and why to tag your Daily Notes
item.description: About resurfacing information from your Daily Notes During the day I run into many interesting topics, tweets, posts on Reddit, thoughts from books, too many to keep track of. I keep everything that I might want to use later, some people are picky, I’m not. Not being picky means I don’t have to make any decisions right now -> which reduces [[friction]]. If not tagged, the daily note becomes a black hole where information just disappears.
